column1: # Purpose: split reads into bead oligo vs. chromatin
# The tag sequences corresponds to read 1:
# - The oligo sequence is the reverse complement sequence of the antibody ID, relative to the 5'-3' orientation of the antibody ID in the single-stranded oligo.
# - The DPM sequence is from DPMBot6
# - The minimum Hamming distance between any of these oligo or DPM sequences is 2. If only certain subsets of oligo or DPM sequences are used, the edit distance could be larger.
# - PREFIX_BPM and PREFIX_DPM give relative or absolute paths to the output files, which will be at ${PREFIX_BPM}_R[12].fastq.gz and ${PREFIX_DPM}_R[12].fastq.gz
